maqras.text: Mi sen d ippunefk mmi s n Meryem, d amedya, agdud ik iugwi t
Qqaoen: "ppif ioebbiten nne$, ne$ Neppa"? Qqaoen ak d akka, i nnmara. Ih, nitni d agdud ipmeoean
Neppa d amdan kan. N$at it, Nerra t d amedya i At Isoail
Lemmer i£ £ ihwi, a Nerr lmalayek di tmurt, deg umkan nnwen
Neppa, s tidep, d ppbut n yimir. Ur ppilit di ccekk fellas. Ddut yidi; wagi d abrid uwqim
Ur kwen issefra$ Cciian! Ih, neppa d acengu nnwen n uuee
Mi n iusa Aisa s issekniyen, inna: "usi$ d $uowen s uuwab, ad awen beggne$ kra, seg wayen i$ef temgarradem. Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Oebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw u d Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eI, d wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid idensen, ilmend uaaqeb n wass aqeoean
Day a poaoun imir, ad asen d ias, deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Iebiben, assen, ad u$alen wa d acengu n wa, kkes ed wid ipeezziben
A yimdanen iW, assa, ur telli tugdi fellawen, ur $webblet
Wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£, u llan d imvuaen
Kecmet Loennet, kunwi akked tlawin nnwen, a ppezhum
Ad asen ddewwioen, s sniwat n uwoe$, akked ibuqalen; degsen ayen cihwant teowiein, ayen iqennaen allen. Kunwi, din, ad twekkoem
D tagi ay d Loennet i tweotem, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
Degs, i kunwi, aias n izwayen, segsen a ppeccem
Ibe$wviyen, s tidep, deg uaaqeb n Loahennama, ad wekkoen
Ur ipfukku fellasen. Nitni, degs, ad kkufferen
Ur ten Nednis, maca llan, nitni, d imednas
Ad necden: "a Malik, xas ad a$ Iqfeo Mass ik"! A d ini: "war ccekk, a pwellfem
Ni$ Nusa n $uowen, s tidep, maca tegwti, degwen, keohen tidep
Ne$ undin ticeokep. Ula d Nekwni Neppandi
Ne$ $ilen ur Nsell ara i lesrar nnsen, akked tumlin nnsen. Ihi, imceggaen nne£, $uosen, pparun
Ini: "lemmer illi mmi s i Uenin, nek d aabad amenzu
Gedha s Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, Mass n usgeld, mgal ayen pxeooiven
Anef asen ad nexxoen, ad uraren, alamma mmugren ass nnsen, i sen ippuwaaaden
D Neppa ay d Oebbi deg igenni, d Oebbi di tmurt, u d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ioqa Win Ilan tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ieoa melmi ay d imir. £uuoeS, ara tu$alem
Wid i la naaoen, war Neppa, ur $uosen kra n ccafuaa, kkes ed inagan n tidep, u nitni eoan
Ma testequav ten anwa iten Ixelqen, a d inin, war ccekk, "d Oebbi". Ihi, acimi zzin akin
Timenna s: "a Mass iw! Wigi, s tidep, d agdud ur numin
Wexxeo asen, ini: "tifrat"! Deqqal ad eoen
Em
S Tezmamt ipbegginen
Nessader ip id, ih, deg iv ioqan. Ih, Nekwni, Nella d ineddaoen
Iban ed degs, yal lameo uuwib
Lameo s$uone£. Ih, Nekwni Nella d wid Ippaznen
Aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ih, Neppa Isell, d Amusnaw
Mass n tmurt, igenwan akked wayen illan garasen, ma tepputebbtem
Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Issidir, Ineqq. D Mass nnwen, u Mass n lejdud nnwen, imezwura
Xaii! Nitni, di ccekk, ppuraren
Qaoaa ass, ideg ara d iawi igenni, abbu ipbegginen
Ad i$umm imudanen. Wagi d aaaqeb aqeoean
A Mass nne$! Kkes a$ aaaqeb; nekwni d lmumnin
Amek ara saun asmekti, wanag iusa ten id Umazan ipbegginen
D$a wexxoen as, u nnan: "d aselmad aoehbani". ²
Ma Nessenqes awen cwii uaaqeb, ihi, kunwi, a ppu$alem ar din
Ass ideg ara Needem fellasen, eeedma tabarart, war ccekk, a d Nerr ppao
